item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:35, so let's meet at 7:00 right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I'll take care of buying tickets, we can all get snacks, and head into the movie. Unos afterwards.

Hope to see you Thursday!

--Dana


OLD STUFF:
While Kick-Ass does admittedly sound like a dumb plot, it's apparently a REALLY good film. It debuted at SXSW, when I was there for the Film Festival in March, and I actually chose not to go (picked another movie during that timeslot instead) because I was saving it to see with our group. (awwww....) See, they knew months ago that it would be in wide release, so I knew I could share it all with you. And, hey, if people at SouthBy didn't like it, then I wouldn't go. Well, I heard a lot about what a terrific movie it was, so now we call can see it together.

SUMMARY:
Dave Lizewski, a comic-book fanboy, decides to take his obsession as inspiration to become a real-life superhero. As any good superhero would, he chooses a new name -- Kick-Ass -- assembles a suit and mask to wear, and gets to work fighting crime. There's only one problem standing in his way: Kick-Ass has absolutely no superpowers. His life is forever changed as he inspires a subculture of copy cats, is hunted by assorted violent and unpleasant characters, and meets up with a pair of crazed vigilantes, including an 11-year-old sword-wielding dynamo, Hit Girl and her father, Big Daddy.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Unos to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Kick-Ass!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Kick-Ass
